   |
20 |     rpc Bar1(optional foo.Bar) returns (foo.Bar);
   |              ^^^^^^^^

   |
21 |     rpc Bar2(foo.Bar) returns (repeated foo.Bar);
   |                                ^^^^^^^^

22 |     rpc Bar2(foo.Bar) returns repeated foo.Bar;
   |                               ^^^^^^^^

   |
22 |     rpc Bar2(foo.Bar) returns repeated foo.Bar;
   |                               ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: replace this with `(repeated foo.Bar)`
